reviews.review_msg: This class was a good level for me coming out of French immersion. The content was useful to improve my grammar and writing although you do have to work for it. Paola is really nice, helpful, and good at explaining concepts. My favourite prof this semester!

Paola is a very kind and helpful professor. She is very patient and gives clear explanations. Although much of the course content was dry and moved at a slow pace, it was relatively easy; you do need to put effort into your work, though.

Frankly, Paola is not a good teacher and does not give useful feedback. Her assignments are unclear and unfairly marked. This class gives the appearance of an easy class, there is little homework, the material in the lectures is simple, but the tests given are very difficult and do not always coordinate with the information given in class.

She is very helpful. Very Very nice Lady. She takes the material at a good pace so you aren't lost or behind. I rarely did "recommended" (but not for marks) homework and I never felt behind in the class. Also I was never embarrassed to ask her anything. VERY APPROACHABLE!
super nice and halpful! she is always understanding of certain cirumstances, if you miss a class she even emails you important things you missed. Very fair marker.
What a sweet person! She's got an infectious smile and is more than willing to help any student. She made French enjoyable and she made me want to learn more. Def recommend!
